CustomField.formula: Net_Tuition__c - Deposit_Amount__c - External_Scholarships_Amount__c - Tentative_Pell_Grant_Amount__c - Tentative_Student_Loan_Amount__c - Tentative_Parent_Loan_Amount__c - Tentative_Private_Loan_Amount__c
